results.title: Systems biology drug screening identifies statins as enhancers of current therapies in chronic lymphocytic leukemia

results.title: [Inhibition of proliferation and induction of apoptosis by simvastatin in K562 leukemic cell line].

results.text_hl: METHODS: @CELLLINE_CVCL:0004 @@@K562@@@ cell line was used to evaluate the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, an inhibitor of @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A (HMG-CoA) reductase@@@, and the combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ with chemotherapeutic agents on the proliferation and apoptosis of @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Lymphocytic_Chronic_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015451 @@@CML@@@ cells.

results.title: Simvastatin impairs mitogen-induced proliferation of malignant B-lymphocytes from humans--in vitro and in vivo studies.
